name: Com Wand Vibrator
about: What it is:A comfortable, body-friendly, waterproof wand vibrator with 25 different types of vibrations..Highlighted Features:- Medical-Grade Silicone: Body-safe material..What Else You Need to Know:Com is Dame’s body-friendly take on the classic wand shape, upgraded for power and comfort. Great as a first wand or for more experienced players craving intense external clitoral stimulation, Com’s curved handle makes it easy to hold while it works its magic..Device Size:10.5 L x 1.75 W x 3.5 D.This Device Comes With:- Wand Vibrator.Due to health & safety reasons, this item is FINAL SALE and cannot be returned or exchanged for cash, credit, or otherwise.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Using Com:.-Please fully charge Com before use. .-Com has three buttons: one for power and patterns, one to increase intensity, and one to lessen intensity...Charging Com:.-If the battery is low, the LED will blink red when the button is pressed. .-The LED may continue to blink when fully charged if plugged into a USB hub with other devices. ..Caring for Com:.-Com is waterproof. .-Always clean Com after every use, using either soap and water or a water-based sex toy cleaner like Dame’s Hand + Vibe Cleaner (sold separately). .-Do not use 100 percent alcohol-based solutions. .-Dry thoroughly. .-Store Com separately from other toys, and away from extreme heat or cold. ..Caution: .-Do not use silicone-based lube. .-Do not clean with products containing alcohol, petroleum, or acetone. .-Do not boil, bake, or clean in the dishwasher. .-Do not insert anally; Com does not have a flared base.
